page.title: 15CHILDREN IN LECHLADE
page.content: These are the results of a survey into games played by children in Lechlade.{PRE-SCHOOL.}Puzzles, snap(cards), bricks (building), water games, Lego (building), jigsaws, constructions (building), toy farm, houses (family acting roles).{ {4-7 YEARS} Skipping, budge (running), marbles, cricket, Street Hawk and Star Wars (adventure games), hopscotch, lines (running).{7-11 YEARS }Budge (running), bulldog (running), war games, skipping, cricket, lines (running), hide & seek, football, marbles, rounders, catching games.{WHERE DO THEY PLAY? }These games are played on our playground and on our field. The pre-school age play many of their games indoors.
